checkDoesNotApply.description: Debug information to show when the resource is a data URI
checkDoesNotApply.message: Check does not apply for data URI: $1

disallowedHeader.description: Report message when the response includes a disallowed header
disallowedHeader.message: Response should not include disallowed $1 header.

disallowedHeaders.description: Report message when the response includes multiple disallowed headers
disallowedHeaders.message: Response should not include disallowed $1 headers.

headerValueShouldOnlyContain.description: Report message when the 'server' header contains more than the server name
headerValueShouldOnlyContain.message: 'server' header value should only contain the server name, not '${(response.headers as any).server}'.
